## Description {#details}

A builder class for instructions that are statically analyzed by llvm-mca.

<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A builder class that knows how to construct Instruction objects.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Every llvm-mca Instruction is described by an object of class InstrDesc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An InstrDesc describes which registers are read/written by the instruction,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as well as the instruction latency and hardware resources consumed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class is used by the tool to construct Instructions and instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// descriptors (i.e. InstrDesc objects).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Information from the machine scheduling model is used to identify processor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// resources that are consumed by an instruction.</span></CodeLine>
